Description:
PRICE REDUCED -VENDOR SAYS SELL
Situated across the road from parkland, with a low maintenance yard, this 4 bedroom home is ideal for permanent living, or as an investment.
Entering the front door, to the left, you find the master bedroom with walk through robe to the ensuite, to the right, there is internal access to the garage and a living area. Continuing through the house you come to a hallway on the left which takes you to the remaining 3 bedrooms, the family bathroom and laundry, to the right is an open plan kitchen and dining area with a sliding door out to an east facing alfresco area. Flowing on from the dining area is the second living area, and sliding door out to the back yard. A total of three reverse cycle air conditioning units, one in the master bedroom, one in the second bedroom, and one in the living area, ensures that the whole home enjoys year round comfort.
This is a great opportunity, and is sure not to last long. Call our office today to arrange your private inspection.
Insights: 57 GOODWOOD DRIVE, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2019 and 56 other 4 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
Luxury Living Close To Lovers Walk
Properties in this exclusive pocket along the Cowes foreshore rarely present on the market.
Situated on a 684sqm allotment, with the stunning white, sandy, north facing beach only a few metres away, and walking distance to cafes, restaurants and shopping - you will be stunned by its impressive and convenient location.
Opulence, style and quality are words that spring to mind as you enter this luxury architect designed home.
Space has not been spared with this cleverly designed unique floor plan, generous open plan living areas and striking high ceilings. Large walls of glass have been carefully positioned to take advantage of natural light and stunning views to the outside areas.
The three levels of the home are connected by an internal elevator, creating easy and functional accessibility.
On the bottom level is the double garage, and ample storage area.
The middle level comprises of 3 separate living areas, and a designer kitchen which features all the modern comforts ranging from stone benchtops, quality appliances, butlers pantry and plenty of storage. A large master suite, is complete with en-suite, spa bath and walk in robe. And to finish this floor is the laundry, bathroom and toilet which is also accessible from the outdoor area which leads onto the inground pool.
The top level completes the home with 2 further bedrooms, both with sunken walk in robes and serviced by an adjoining family bathroom and toilet.
The outdoor entertaining area will not disappoint, with its very own solar heated inground pool and undercover alfresco area and resort feel.
With so many features, this home must be inspected and is sure to impress the most astute buyer.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island

Description:
Beautifully appointed residence!
Set in the heart of Cowes, within walking distance to the beautiful beaches and all that the town has to offer is this single level, near new, immaculately presented home.
The centrally located open plan living, kitchen and dining area is spacious in design and flows effortlessly out to the fully covered rear entertaining area which looks over the low maintenance, yet established surrounds.
The home also features three spacious bedrooms all with built in robes, the master with walk in and ensuite, a modern bathroom, separate toilet and laundry.
Offering a host of additional features including ducted heating and cooling, walk in pantry, stainless steel appliances to the kitchen, polished timber floors and carpet throughout and a double garage.
All of this within a fully fenced 665sqm approx. allotment.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Perfect Location, Pristine Home
A true showcase of family living, this immaculate home will suit all types of buyers, perfect family home, ideal investment or low maintenance holiday home. The property offers four sizable bedrooms, the master complete with walk in robe and full ensuite. All other bedrooms have built in robes, and serviced by a central family bathroom and separate toilet
Upon entry to the home you are greeted by a light filled formal lounge and the master bedroom, situated practically away from the central family area - perfect for enjoying some peace and quiet!
When they say the heart of the home is the kitchen, this open plan kitchen meals family area is true to the meaning, also offering easy access through sliding doors to the protected outdoor area, perfect for summer entertaining.
Ideally located in central Cowes on 602spm approx of low maintenance garden, the property also offers a double garage with rear single roller door, giving you easy access into the sizeable back yard.
Being centrally located, in a quiet neighbourhood and only a short walk to all Cowes has to offer, just under a 1km stroll to the Thompson Ave shops, café, restaurants, wine bars, supermarkets and schools, and only 1.3km approx to the pristine north facing bay beach and Cowes Yacht club.
This property ticks a lot of boxes, and quality built homes in this area don't last long in this market. Call now to arrange an inspection!
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Beach house delight
Located only a short stroll from picturesque Cowes front beach, this property is perfectly positioned for a permanent residence or holiday home.
The renovated home is superbly presented with a floorplan consisting of three bedrooms, a light filled, open plan dining, kitchen and living space and bathroom with double vanities and separate toilet.
Outside the property features low maintenance grounds and a rear covered deck provides the ideal location for afternoon entertaining and summer barbeques. Additionally, the single garage and adjoining single carport provide excellent access for boat or caravan storage.
This impressive home is within walking distance from one of Phillip Islands most popular and scenic family friendly beaches, and is only a short walk from central Cowes, the GP track and all of Phillip Islands many attractions. Inspection will impress.

Description:
A Designers Touch
This beautifully presented, modern, family home located in Cowes and just a short walk or drive to the local beaches, shops and cafes is a dream come true.
The home comprises two living zones, one of which is open plan, four spacious robed bedrooms, two bathrooms; the master is complete with a generous walk in robe and ensuite. The kitchen area is equipped with modern electric cooktop, oven and dishwasher.
The rear undercover entertaining area flows off the main living zone and can be fully enclosed with the café blinds allowing for year round use and ensures you will be kept warm with the overhead heater for the winter months. There is also a second sun drenched deck that overlooks the established garden and is perfect for a summer BBQ.
Other features include; two split system heating and cooling, carpet and tiles throughout, ample storage, study nook, garden shed, intercom and keyless entry and plenty of room for a caravan/boat/trailer. All of this is set within a 625sqm approx. fenced allotment and is complete with a veggie patch and landscaped surrounds.
Inspection is sure to impress!
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Neat Retreat

Three generous bedrooms with polished timber floors take care of the sleeping arrangements and it also features a central bathroom with separate toilet.
There is also a double garage out back plus another two carports with room for the boat and caravan.
Only a short walk to the beach and a quick drive into town this one won't last long.

Description:
A Fantastic Lifestyle Opportunity Awaits!!!
Superbly located in a central position, just a few minutes from the vibrant lifestyle Cowes and Phillip Island has to offer. This beautifully presented family home offers the ultimate in tranquil flexible living with space and privacy, only 200m approx to the pristine north facing bay beach.
The home is oriented to the north east and is bathed in natural sunlight. The well thought out floor plan has been designed with family and entertaining in mind, boasting two separate living rooms making it a breeze to accommodate for extra family members. The kitchen, meals, dining area is the central hub of the home, with easy access out to the alfresco dining area.
A generous sized master bedroom sits at the front of the home, which is complemented by a full ensuite, walk in robe and adjoins the separate lounge room making it perfect for the parents to retreat to. Featuring two separate bedrooms, family bathroom and separate toilet at the rear of the home which can easily be closed off when not in use. Split systems, heating and cooling will ensure all year round comfort.
Separate from the home, two further buildings provide even more options. The double garage has been converted into a spacious studio which is perfect for running a business from home. Alternatively, somewhere for extra guests to stay or as a perfect man cave or teen retreat as it has its own heating and cooling plus combustion wood heater. There is also a separate storage shed which is the perfect place to store surf boards, bikes and tools.
A long drive way down the side of the house makes it easy to park all the cars and boats off the street. The secure fully fenced 817sqm approx. yard provides ample place for the kids and pets, and even has its own concreted basketball court!
Close to all the amenities, including a great selection of cafes, wine bars, restaurants and shops, this ideal beachside property offers great lifestyle advantages that you'll find it hard to look past.
Enquire today to ensure scheduled Open for Inspections are going ahead, due to strong market condition.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
A Rare Find: Mid Century Original!
Situated in a highly sought after location being just a few steps to the amazing north facing Cowes beach is this rare and fabulous mid century home boasting gorgeous original features and generous spaces throughout including the traditional colourful wall paper and light fittings. Set on a large fully fenced allotment of approximately 999 square metres, the home comprises a great size living area including the original and functional kitchen, three large bedrooms, a family bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. Perfectly located to the boat ramp and kiosk, the property would make an excellent development site or an ideal holiday or permanent home as is with the beauty of the sixties era! The home could easily be transformed with styling to create a more modern residence whilst still retaining the classic mid-century look.
A leisurely fifteen minute (approx) walk along the bay beach will take you in to the Cowes shopping precinct including restaurants, bars and cafes.
Other great features of this incredible property include a double garage, split system heating/cooling, original timber flooring under the existing carpet, new hot water service, huge yard

Description:
Central And Convenient Cowes Unit
This perfectly located 2 bedroom brick unit, is walking distance to the town centre, beach, cafes, medical and sporting facilities and everything that Cowes has to offer.
Situated in a block with 2 other units, this property is surrounded by generous outdoor space, and also offers privacy and security.
Recently renovated, the property is ready to move into - as permanent, holiday living or as a great investment property waiting for a tenant.
The kitchen, living, dining area opens out onto a lovely north facing sun room and courtyard. The master suite features a walk in robe and a walk through shared bathroom, and separate toilet. A single garage provides secure parking and a place to store those garden tools!
Super neat, inspection is a must!

Description:
Come And Enjoy This Home!
This immaculately presented and comfortable home located just moments to the beautiful north facing Cowes bay beach and shopping precinct would suit as a holiday home or low maintenance permanent residence on a generous allotment of 654 square metres. The upper level of the split level home comprises a light filled open plan living kitchen and dining area with sliding doors to the outdoor entertaining area. The lower level of the home features three good sized bedrooms all with built in robes as well as the family bathroom, a separate toilet and laundry. There is plenty of parking and ample yard space for everyone. Great potential here in this fantastic location with some established trees including a fabulous palm tree in the front yard.

Description:
All You Need
Privately set within a leafy landscape of approx 817m2, and only a short stroll to the heart of Cowes, and only just over 200m to Cowes pristine north facing beaches and everything this seaside town has to offer, is this beautifully presented home.
Outside the property offers curbside appeal, and inside the home is filled with natural light, and large living spaces, and has a great holiday feel.
Boasting four spacious bedrooms, functional kitchen, a central living area that opens out to an outdoor north facing entertainment deck. Additional features include, split system heating cooling, combustion wood heater perfect for those winter nights, vaulted ceilings throughout the upstairs and ceiling fans in all bedrooms.
Down stairs is self contained and perfectly set up for a substantial home office or a teenage retreat. Or potential to make a little bit of extra income and rent it out over the holidays.
A large shed with concrete flooring, high ceiling and clearance for boat and caravan storage. In addition there is also a double car end to end carport and excellent additional car parking space for a variety of vehicles. With a prime location, this very versatile property offers the best of seaside living combined with all of the convenience of being walking distance to Thompson Avenue.
This is an opportunity not to be missed!
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure scheduled Open for Inspections are going ahead.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Stylish Tribute To Craftsmanship
Built by a local builder and spanning over two levels is this modern and contemporary home in the ever popular and family friendly Seagrove Estate. This property is only a short walk to the beach and Cowes shopping precinct.
The lower level offers two robed bedrooms, laundry, main bathroom with a huge oval shaped bath and a spacious open plan living, kitchen and dining area that flows directly out onto the partially undercover rear North facing entertainment deck.
Upstairs is the perfect parents retreat, comprising of the master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite and a second living area. There is also an upstairs entertaining area which takes in lovely water glimpses of the bay.
To complete this package the home has some great quality fixtures and fittings, including: stone benchtops to the kitchen and bathrooms, two split system heating and cooling units, electric cooking, dishwasher, carpet and tiles throughout. In addition to this there is also a huge double garage with high clearance for boats/trailers and cars.
All of this is set within a generous 729sqm approx. fenced allotment and with the potential to be purchased almost fully furnished why not make the most of this opportunity as a first home or investment property?
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Contemporay Design, Sustainable Seagrove Estate,Walk to beach and shops.
Practical in design and making full use of the optimum north facing position, this contemporary gem offers generous proportions and premium finishes throughout the home. The floorplan offers two living areas, a formal sitting room and a fabulous open plan family living area. The family living room features a wood fire and glass doors link it to a great alfresco area that flows seamlessly to the private garden. A stunning kitchen featuring high gloss cabinets , ceasar stone bench tops and stainless steel appliances is very much part of this fabulous dining and living area and has lovely views to the garden.
Offering ideal family living with a spacious master bedroom with walk in robe and en-suite and a wing of three bedrooms and family bathroom. The bedrooms all feature built in robes and quality fittings.
Quality finishes feature throughout the home and include the wood fire and two split systems, 8 solar panels offset the power costs and instantaneous gas hotwater.
Enter from the double gates in Boobook Grove and be surprised by the fully fitted workshop with bathroom facilities and space for the boat or caravan, this is an absolute bonus for the home handyman or perhaps a rumpus room for the teenagers.

Description:
Perfectly positioned and presented
This beautifully presented home is perfectly located in the heart of Cowes just a short stroll to the Cowes foreshore and local restaurants, boutique shops and all amenities.
The lower level features the master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite, sunny open plan living and dining area and modern, well appointed kitchen with the added convenience of a powder room. The upper level consists of two further bedrooms, second bathroom with spa bath, study nook and access to the private covered balcony. Additional features include large double garage and split system heating and cooling.
If you are looking for permanent living, this home is offered fully furnished with nothing to do but move in and enjoy this low maintenance lifestyle. Alternatively, it would make an ideal investment or holiday getaway for all the family.
